column6: This is a run 2 weeks prior to my actual training begins. But it will set a baseline. There is also a good chance I will have to skip most of these runs as I am on vacation.
run to a hill then 8 x 30 secs uphill then jog down
Warm up then 3M at a brisk pace timed. Warm down.
Warm up then 8 x 90 secs fast / 90 secs slow
Run to a hill then 8 x 30 secs uphill jogging back down
Warm up then 5 x 3mins fast 2 mins slow (or 5 x 800m on track with 400m jog recoveries)
Warm up then 3M at brisk pace timed then warm down.
Warm up then 9 x 90 secs fast (or 400m) with 90 secs (or 200m) slow.
15M slow with 5M in middle at marathon pace or Shoreline Half marathon
Run to a hill then 10 x 30 secs uphill jogging back down
Warm up then 9 x 90 secs fast (or 400m) with 90 secs (or 200m) slow.
Warm up then 6 x 3 mins fast 2 mins slow (or 6 x 800m on track with 400m jog recoveries)
Slow with 5M in middle at marathon pace (7:45)
Hill running: 11 x 30 secs or fartlek with 12 - 15 30-sec bursts
Warm up then 4 x 6 mins (or mile) with 2 mins rest between each. Time them.
